songs.title: We Found Love (Chuckie Dub)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Rihanna]
We found love

[Pre-Chorus: Rihanna]
It's the way I'm feeling, I just can't deny

[Chorus: Rihanna]
We found love
We found love

[Drop: DJ Chuckie]

[Rihanna]
Shine a light through an open door

[Chorus: Rihanna]
We found love
We found love

[Drop: DJ Chuckie]

[Chorus: Rihanna]
We found love
We found love
